summary: This mod is what you have custom voice of the Igraine
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/nIeyA87.jpg[/img]

Sorry,I am not good at English.
This is a machine translation.

[size=3]####About this mod####[/size]
・This mod is what you have custom voice of the Igraine
・This mod is inspired by the words love " ARMORED CORE for answer ."
・She is Japanese Custom Voice
・She is  standalone follower and do not require additional mods.
・She is set as Essential.
・Required DLC:Dragonborn.
・Her language and body can be selected during the installation.

Name: Igraine
body type:UNP or SeveNBase
Combat style : Shout and the sword and recovery magic.
Location  : Whiterun （Jorrvaskr Living Quarters）. 
[size=4]
Japanesue Voice actor : [url=http://www.milmil.cc/user/tomotan/]知巳[/url]様
English Translator:[url=https://coconala.com/users/610897]ーMOEー様[/url]
[/size]
Her custom voice version now supports marriage function!　　
⇒When you talked to her equipped with "Amulet of Mara", marriage event occurs.

She is used to when the Dragonrend dragon is in the air.
Please use the there is no practical use , but the essence
[img]http://i.imgur.com/GUJroYi.png[/img]


[youtube]uPxwFlIRzT0[/youtube]

[size=4]Skyrim Mods & More Episode 16: Sickest Mod Ever!
[/size]Thanks for the review!
[youtube]BbR7pIbGYUQ[/youtube]

■Version Information
Ver1.0.1
・Addition for non-custom voice

Ver1.1
・Change the installation Fomod format.
・Add SaveNbase BodyType.
・Modify the neck of texture
Ver1.5
・I add a conversation based on a quest of civil war
・New Face,New Hair.
・Additional Weapon.
・Add conversation between followers

Ver1.5.1
・English version release.


■Conversation events between followers
・It will be posted on the screen shot as a reference.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/jt19yJB.jpg[/img]

[b][size=3]■[b]Special Thanks[/b]
[/size][/b][b][size=3]borntoraisehell1979 - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40925/?]Private Squad V03[/url]
Skuld VoiceActor: 四ッ谷ちとせ [b][size=3]様[/size][/b](http://vtools.moo.jp/Chitose/ )

Mi0108 - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71167/?]Rabi Follower_Japanese Custom Voice[/url]
Rabi Voice actor:ナユキユズ 様(http://hibiki.html.xdomain.jp/index.html)[/size][/b]


[size=3]####About Japanese Custom Voice####[/size]
＜When conversation for to follow does not appear…＞
When conversation for to follow if does not appear, please fix the order of the ESP, etc. BOSS.

＜EFF＞
・If you have introduced the EFF, do not appear conversation menu.
 Please use mind control to EFF user.
 That way, will hire even EFF.

[size=3]####Recommended MOD####[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]Face Light[/url] by [b]tktk1[/b]

[/b]MOD to Specifies the home of followers.
